errorMessagesLoginPage.invalidCredentialsErrorMessage: Your username and/or password is incorrect. Please try again.

errorMessagesRegistrationPage.accountNumberText: Your account number can be found on the upper right side of your bill.
errorMessagesRegistrationPage.usernameHelpText: Username must be 5 to 30 characters. It can consist of a combination of letters and numbers, or the following characters ^.$#@-_.
errorMessagesRegistrationPage.passwordHelpText: Must be 8 to 30 characters with at least one: lowercase letter, uppercase letter, and number. May also include the following characters: !.#%&*.
errorMessagesRegistrationPage.passwordCriteriaMessage: Password does not meet minimum requirements.
errorMessagesRegistrationPage.dataMismatchWithCISMessage: Information provided does not match our records, please try again.
errorMessagesRegistrationPage.personalInfoMandatoryMessage: Please enter driver's license number or last 4 of social security number or street number.
errorMessagesRegistrationPage.existingUsernameMessage: The username already exists. Please enter another.
